body:
Please if you record player hacking videos, make them unlisted.
When you type in Avicus, you don't want to see a load of hackers do you?
That will look a tad bad for us don't you think?
Despite this, only a mod needs to see it - no one else
body_tagged:

title: [Wish] Unlist hacking videos.

replies.body: Some people already do this, but I definitely encourage it.
replies.body_tagged: Some people already do this, but I definitely encourage it.

replies.body: I believe this is stated in the "Report Formatting" post, and if it isn't it should be.
replies.body_tagged: I believe this is stated in the "Report Formatting" post, and if it isn't it should be.

replies.body: When I record a hacker I like to edit the video and make it look nice. C:
replies.body_tagged: When I record a hacker I like to edit the video and make it look nice. C:

replies.body: I always used to forget to do this, but recently I've been making sure to!

replies.body: If mine are up there, I'll do it. Otherwise I have no purpose in it. I usually won't take down my videos unless I'm asked to.
replies.body_tagged: If mine are up there, I'll do it. Otherwise I have no purpose in it. I usually won't take down my videos unless I'm asked to.
